name: Bose Wave SoundTouch music system IV - Audio system - espresso black | Dell USA
description: There's a world of music out there. This compact system lets you easily enjoy all of it. Use it to stream millions of songs from music services such as Spotify and Pandora, thousands of Internet radio stations and the music stored on your smartphone, tablet or computer.There's also a CD player and AM/FM radio tuner. So you can hear whatever you want with room-filling Wave sound - all from an easy-to-use system with a fresh, updated design.
